com.quorum.tessera.sync

Interface ResendPartyStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResendPartyStoreImpl

    public interface ResendPartyStore
    Stores nodes that need to be contacted for resending existing transactions Also stores auxiliary information such as the number of attempts already tried for that node

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ATTEMPTS 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUnseenParties(Collection<Party> partiesToRequestFrom)
      Adds a new set of parties to the list of all parties that are outstanding to be contacted.
      Optional<SyncableParty> getNextParty()
      Retrieves the next party to contact in the queue
      void incrementFailedAttempt(SyncableParty attemptedParty)
      Submit a party that had been attempted to contact but failed This will increase its attempt count or discard it if the maximum number of attempts have been reached

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_ATTEMPTS

        static final int MAX_ATTEMPTS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addUnseenParties

        void addUnseenParties(Collection<Party> partiesToRequestFrom)
        Adds a new set of parties to the list of all parties that are outstanding to be contacted. Sets the number of attempts for each party to 0, even if the party already exists in the list with a higher attempt count. Duplicates are allowed and will be treated individually when making requests. i.e. adding the same url twice will allow twice the limit of maximum attempts
        Parameters:
        partiesToRequestFrom - the parties to add to the contact list

      • getNextParty

        Optional<SyncableParty> getNextParty()
        Retrieves the next party to contact in the queue
        Returns:
        Returns Optional.empty() if there are no parties to contact in the request queue else an Optional containing a party to contact

      • incrementFailedAttempt

        void incrementFailedAttempt(SyncableParty attemptedParty)
        Submit a party that had been attempted to contact but failed This will increase its attempt count or discard it if the maximum number of attempts have been reached
        Parameters:
        attemptedParty - the party that has failed to be contacted
